ï£¿ Music Activity

ï£¿ Music Activity takes your Apple Music data, analyzes it and displays reports showing your listening history. Your data is not stored or shared in anyway unless you use the sharing features provided by this application.

How to get your ï£¿ Music Data

ðŸ¤ª

Check out the demo

Analyzing your file...

Back

Drag & Drop
Apple Play Music Activity.csv
here or browse to find it.

My Device

Back

Step 1

Go to privacy.apple.com and login using your Apple ID & password.

Step 2

Click on the first option "Get a copy of your data".

Step 3

You may select any options you wish to get data for but the data you will use for this app is the first option: "Apple Media Services Information".

Step 4

Choose your preferred max file size. *Please note that if your total music history is larger than the file size you choose your data may not be accurate.
